headline: Costco Wholesale (NasdaqGS:COST) Reports Strong Sales Growth, Launches New DripDrop Product
summary: Costco Wholesale (NasdaqGS:COST) recently launched an exclusive Zero Sugar DripDrop® Hydration variety pack, following strong sales results for the period ending May 4, 2025. With net sales climbing 7% in April and 8.2% year-to-date, the company's performance reflects a robust retail sector. Concurrently, a 10.90% share price increase over the past month aligns with broader market trends, bolstered by news of a favorable U.S.-U.K. trade deal and improved investor sentiment. While broader...

headline: Costco Members 'Consolidate' Shopping at Warehouse Club As They Seek Value
summary: The membership-based retailer said sales rose 7% year-over-year in April, with meats and baked goods selling particularly well.

headline: Costco Delivers Decent April Comparable Sales Performance
summary: Costco's comparable sales for April increase 4.4%. Its distinctive membership business model and pricing power set it apart from traditional players.

headline: FSTA: Not Sexy, But Fidelity's Consumer Staples ETF Is Outperforming The Market
summary: FSTA provides defensive exposure to top consumer staples like Costco and P&G, with inflation resilience and dollar tailwinds. Learn why FSTA ETF is a buy.

headline: Costco: April sales up 7%

headline: 1 Profitable Stock That Stand Out and 2 to Turn Down
summary: Not all profitable companies are built to last - some rely on outdated models or unsustainable advantages. Just because a business is in the green today doesn’t mean it will thrive tomorrow.
